New Records: Omari Glasgow is one goal shy of tying Guyana's all-time scoring record
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Jamaal Shabazz emphasized the team's determination to bounce back from a 3-1 loss to Suriname.
Captain Elliot Bonds reflected on the team's mistakes and their focus on improving for the match against Martinique.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden Jaguars have struggled on the road with one win and four losses in their last five away games.
Martinique has a mixed record with two wins, two draws, and one loss in their last five matches.
